channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 朝鲜金正恩在不平等加剧的情况下寻求农村地区的“产业革命”
item.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has called for an "industry revolution" in rural regions by building factories nationwide, state media KCNA said on Thursday, amid chronic food shortages and widening economic inequality.翻译:官方媒体朝中社周四表示，在长期粮食短缺和经济不平等加剧的情况下，朝鲜领导人金正恩呼吁在全国范围内建设工厂，在农村地区进行“工业革命”。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 大众汽车与小鹏汽车签署协议开发两款 B 级电池电动汽车
item.description: German automaker Volkswagen and Chinese electric vehicles maker XPeng have entered an agreement for joint development of two B-class battery EVs, the companies said on Thursday.翻译:德国汽车制造商大众汽车和中国电动汽车制造商小鹏汽车周四表示，已达成协议，联合开发两款 B 级电池电动汽车。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 商务部长表示中方愿加强与埃及的经贸合作
item.description: China is willing to further promote economic and trade cooperation with Egypt, and to continue to encourage and support its enterprises to invest and start businesses in the African country, the Chinese commerce ministry cited its minister as saying.翻译:中国商务部援引中国商务部部长的话说，中方愿进一步促进与埃及的经贸合作，继续鼓励和支持中国企业赴埃投资兴业。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 论文称加拿大因与北京分享信息而解雇了两名科学家
item.description: Canada fired two scientists working at a high-security infectious disease laboratory in 2021 because they provided confidential information to China, the Globe and Mail newspaper reported on Wednesday.翻译:据《环球邮报》周三报道，加拿大于 2021 年解雇了两名在高度安全的传染病实验室工作的科学家，因为他们向中国提供了机密信息。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早间竞价：聚光灯聚焦日本、澳大利亚消费者
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 北京将举办2027年世锦赛
item.description: Beijing has been selected to host the 2027 World Athletics Championships, governing body World Athletics said on Wednesday.翻译:世界田径管理机构周三表示，北京已被选为举办 2027 年世界田径锦标赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪高管表示正在寻找墨西哥工厂选址
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD is looking for a location in Mexico to set up a factory aimed at boosting the company's share of the local market, BYD Americas CEO Stella Li told Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:比亚迪美洲公司首席执行官斯特拉·李周三对路透社表示，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪正在墨西哥寻找建厂地点，旨在提高该公司在当地市场的份额。
item.author: Daina Beth Solomon

item.title: 美国贸易负责人本周排除了世贸组织争端解决方案，但表示情绪积极
item.description: U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Wednesday ruled out an agreement on World Trade Organization dispute settlement appeals reform this week but said WTO negotiations on the issue were positive and showing some progress.翻译:美国贸易代表凯瑟琳·戴周三排除了本周就世贸组织争端解决上诉改革达成协议的可能性，但表示世贸组织就此问题的谈判是积极的，并显示出一些进展。
item.author: Alexander Cornwell

item.title: Polestar 融资近 10 亿美元，预计 2024 年利润率将有所改善
item.description: Polestar said on Wednesday it had raised a $950 million loan from a bank syndicate, helping to fill a gap left when Volvo Cars said it would stop funding the electric carmaker, sending its New York-listed shares 18.5% higher.翻译:Polestar周三表示，已从银行财团筹集了9.5亿美元贷款，有助于填补沃尔沃汽车表示将停止向这家电动汽车制造商提供资金后留下的资金缺口，导致其在纽约上市的股价上涨18.5%。
item.author: Marie Mannes

item.title: 印度和南非在世贸组织谈判中阻止重大投资协议
item.description: India and South Africa have filed a formal objection against an investment agreement at a World Trade Organization meeting in Abu Dhabi, blocking its adoption in a move that observers say could block hundreds of billions of dollars in investment.翻译:印度和南非在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织会议上正式反对一项投资协议，阻止该协议的通过，观察人士称此举可能会阻碍数千亿美元的投资。
item.author: Rachna Uppal, Emma Farge

item.title: ATP与沙特阿拉伯PIF签署多年战略合作伙伴关系
item.description: The ATP Tour and Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) have signed a multi-year strategic partnership, the governing body of men's tennis said on Wednesday in a move highlighting the growing influence of the Gulf nation on global sport.翻译:男子网球管理机构周三表示，ATP巡回赛和沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（PIF）已经签署了一项多年战略合作伙伴关系，此举凸显了这个海湾国家对全球体育运动日益增长的影响力。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 印度在世贸组织会议上寻求农业和争端制度改革
item.description: India hopes to reach a deal on a key element of agricultural reform as well as the restoration of the World Trade Organization's arbitration powers at a high-level meeting in Abu Dhabi this week, its trade minister said on Wednesday.翻译:印度贸易部长周三表示，印度希望本周在阿布扎比举行的高级别会议上就农业改革的关键内容以及恢复世界贸易组织的仲裁权达成协议。
item.author: Rachna Uppal

item.title: 意大利与特斯拉和中国汽车制造商洽谈寻找第二家汽车生产商
item.description: Italy has been in talks with Tesla and three Chinese carmakers as it tries to attract another manufacturer and reach an annual output target of 1.3 million vehicles, the industry minister said on Wednesday.翻译:意大利工业部长周三表示，意大利一直在与特斯拉和三家中国汽车制造商进行谈判，试图吸引另一家制造商并实现 130 万辆汽车的年产量目标。
item.author: Giuseppe Fonte, Giulio Piovaccari

item.title: 美国共和党参议员希望提高对中国汽车的关税
item.description: Republican U.S. Senator Josh Hawley introduced legislation Wednesday to hike tariffs on Chinese vehicle imports as concerns mounted about the potential competitive impact on U.S. car companies.翻译:美国共和党参议员乔什·霍利周三提出立法，提高对中国汽车进口的关税，因为人们越来越担心这对美国汽车公司的潜在竞争影响。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 中国总理李克强敦促加强与美国的经贸关系
item.description: China and the United States should strengthen economic and trade ties and Washington should avoid decoupling from China, Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday, during a meeting with a visiting U.S. delegation, Chinese state radio reported.翻译:据中国国家广播电台报道，中国国务院总理李强周三在会见来访的美国代表团时表示，中美应加强经贸关系，华盛顿应避免与中国脱钩。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：美国增长 3% 以上；苹果降档，新西兰惊喜
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大众汽车称长安汽车前首席软件架构师将出任Cariad中国新任首席执行官
item.description: Volkswagen said on Wednesday that Frank Han, the former chief software architect of Changan Auto, will take over as chief executive of its Cariad China unit on March 1.翻译:大众汽车周三表示，长安汽车前首席软件架构师韩弗兰克将于 3 月 1 日接任 Cariad 中国首席执行官。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 拜登严厉打击美国数据流向中国和俄罗斯
item.description: President Joe Biden's administration on Wednesday unveiled an executive order barring genomic data transfers to China, as it seeks to protect American personal data over national security concerns.翻译:乔·拜登总统的政府周三公布了一项行政命令，禁止向中国传输基因组数据，出于国家安全考虑，寻求保护美国个人数据。
item.author: Alexandra Alper, Kanishka Singh

item.title: 中国福建金华公司被美国指控窃取商业机密
item.description: Fujian Jinhua Integrated Circuit Co Ltd was cleared on Tuesday of U.S. allegations that the Chinese chipmaker stole trade secrets, in a case that fanned tensions in an intensifying technology race between the United States and China.翻译:周二，美国对中国芯片制造商福建晋华集成电路有限公司窃取商业机密的指控被澄清，该案加剧了中美之间日益激烈的技术竞赛的紧张局势。
item.author: Kanishka Singh

item.title: 美联储降息前盘点美国石油期货收低
item.description: U.S. crude oil futures settled lower on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve held firm on its decision to hold off cutting interest rates in the near future, while growing U.S. crude stockpiles added further pressure.翻译:美联储坚守近期暂缓降息的决定，而美国原油库存增加进一步增加压力，周三美国原油期货收低。
item.author: Georgina Mccartney
